text:
Zayn Malik and Gigi Hadid announced their split just days ago, but it seems as though things might be coming up roses for the former One Direction member.

In a captionless photo posted on Instagram Friday (Mar. 16), Malik shows off his latest addition his collection of ink. On the back of his head is a massive rose tattoo, with the stem reaching down his neck.

In another post following, the singer is seen at a tattoo parlour getting a piece on his neck, with the caption "Neck yat." It isn't clear whether he got another tattoo in addition to the rose. See both posts below.

A post shared by Zayn Malik (@zayn) on Mar 16, 2018 at 1:42pm PDT
title: Zayn Malik Gets Rose Tattoo on His Head After Gigi Hadid Breakup
